select sm.menu_id, sm.parent_id, sm.menu_name, sm.path, sm.component, sm.redirect, sm.perms, sm.icon, sm.type, sm.hide_menu, sm.ignore_keep_alive, sm.hide_breadcrumb, sm.hide_children_in_menu, sm.current_active_menu, sm.order_num, sm.create_time, sm.modify_time from system_menu sm ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select sm.menu_id, sm.parent_id, sm.menu_name, sm.path, sm.component, sm.redirect, sm.perms, sm.icon, sm.type, sm.hide_menu, sm.ignore_keep_alive, sm.hide_breadcrumb, sm.hide_children_in_menu, sm.current_active_menu, sm.order_num, sm.create_time, sm.modify_time from system_menu sm where sm.type <> 1 and sm.menu_id in (select distinct srm.menu_id from system_role_menu srm left join system_role sr on (srm.role_id = sr.role_id) left join system_user_role sur on (sur.role_id = sr.role_id) left join system_user su on (su.user_id = sur.user_id) where su.username = #{username}) ${ew.customSqlSegment}
mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from system_role r left join system_user_role ur on (r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join system_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join system_role_menu rm on (rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join system_menu m on (m.menu_id = rm.menu_id) where u.username = #{userName} and m.perms is not null and m.perms <> ''
